mapper.insert: INSERT INTO study (num, title, writer, content) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(max(num), 0)+1 FROM study), #{title}, #{writer}, #{content})
mapper.update: UPDATE study SET title=#{title}, content=#{content} WHERE num=#{num}
UPDATE study SET cnt = cnt + 1 WHERE num = #{num}
mapper.select: SELECT title,cnt,regdate,num FROM ( SELECT title,cnt, regdate,num FROM study WHERE regdate >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-7,'YYYYMMDD') ORDER BY cnt DESC ) WHERE rownum <= 4
